p: With the increasing of the concentration, the DPPH free radical scavenging potential observably increased ( Fig 1). Roughly 111.9 μL of the extracts could scavenge about 50% of the free radicals. The IC 50 of DPPH scavenging activity was recorded as 4.8 mg/μL, 10 mg/μL extracts could scavenge 100% DPPH free radicals.
